name: zem
text: The death of what and the birth of what ?

name: catachresis
text:
As far as I can tell this asherdan guy is from the tedious bitter board of people who love Achewood but are still unaccountably pedantic dicks
There was some drama of which I am vaguely aware

name: canusdivinus
text: It's just that so many of his comments deserve more than one lame per person that you can't help but lame a reasonable one to make up for it.

name: caduceo
text: A comment left by caduceo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, salvagebar, odei, ajg, AtlanticCity, Audhumla, nilehus, peterjoel, pulkbaby)

name: ih8jonmayr
text: A comment left by ih8jonmayr was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Bielebog, Lionheart, mnemodomi)

name: zem
text:
yeah, I kind of agree with you. with the comments, and the lames, and this one dude who cares about message boards and wants to let us know, all right below each strip, it makes me associate achewood with the internet. that's not a good association. I also worry (probably unnecessarily) that with the comments right there, Onstad can't help but be influenced by them in some way or another.

I like the rating thing, though. Especially combined with the "highest rated you haven't looked at" links, which have helped me find a lot of great ones I haven't seen in forever.

name: saru
text:
Let me get this straight...
Are you saying you do not have mad respect for the Internet?

name: pogo
text: You don't have to read the comments.

name: alejandroadam
text: I posted that a year ago for those of you paying attention.  It was more different then but not much. yes. you don't have to read comments. and I don't. unless I feel like talking about the comic anyway. so yes....   /agreed

name: pogo
text: Of course you do have to read the stuff on 4/25/08 when the world changed.

name: alejandroadam
text: I try and respond. you know...  owning nerds lives.

name: tragicone
text: and it never did die.

name: juancarlos
text: A comment left by juancarlos was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, last_tuesday, whoppin, valuedan, QuietWyatt)

name: epicurus
text:
The fact that there is anyone, anywhere, who knows what this means and cares about it makes me sad.
And yes, this strip is an unremitting hostlie verbal assault on whoever is the victim here.

name: os
text: "'Stad". Hah!

name: centipede_damascus
text: Philipe never quite adjusted to the life of a child star. Little known fact: three "Philipe"s have assumed the role since the original Philipe (Pictured here, real name Franklin Dupree) turned thirteen and discovered pot. He now lives in a home in Pittsburgh, and receives a small but steady income from "Achewood" royalties.

name: killerlimpet
text: nooooooooooooooo!

name: erinye
text: The saddest thing is a child star who lives a life of gruesome excess and never reaches any state of self-realization beyond "I've never been more loved than when I was five."

name: johnnyrocker
text: Every child star should die when they turn 10, to spare us all the unpleasantness of their puberty.

name: spinynorman
text: NPH is pretty badass rockin'.

name: charchar
text: Your avatar/ comment combo is truly a force with which to reckon.

name: anzio
text: This might as well be canon.

name: wolfslice
text:
This is indeed a gristly portrait of the future Philippe. He's become so disillusioned that he actually grew legs!

And I have been to this "Touamb" that Asherdan speaks of, it is a terrible place run by basically this clone of Pat, for real.

name: never_die
text:
it is a shame the readership didn't care about Ray and his hairy nachos.
Sigh. the story arc that never was.

name: achewoodno1fan
text: wow! THIS COMIC pissed me off, and then, THE COMMENTS kind of NULLIFIED me with some kind of awkward dialouge!

name: tellumo
text: You are Zippy the Pinhead, and I claim my five pounds.

name: spinynorman
text: I don't know what the fuck your comment means, sir, but I laughed so you got a chubby

name: tellumo
text:
Haha, thanks! The following links may be useful if you want to learn more. Judging by your username, you'd probably dig Zippy.

Zippy the Pinhead
[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/You_Are_X_And_I_Claim_My_Five_Pounds]You are X and I claim my five pounds[/url]
Understanding Zippy

name: scorpio_nadir
text: zippy has been a cult icon since the '60's.

name: sargasm
text: it must be some crazy internet drama going on to make everyone talk about it instead of the amazing jokes in the last panel.  WATERMELON SCHNAPPS, people!

name: songbirdspectre
text: philippe's legs are CREEPY. :(

name: gormster
text: No, dammit! PHILLIPPE IS FIVE!

name: bigtom
text: whatever, fag

name: soticoto
text: Chubby soley for that coming from Jareth.

name: wonelove
text: NO!

name: slimpickens
text: I wouldn't be above believing that Philippe's entire "naive five year-old" character has been developed just to give his lines in this strip maximum impact.

name: greatwhite
text: The only time Phillipe will ever age.

name: highfeverblues
text: Not so.

name: indolent
text: phillipe's 'stache is full of mega win

name: synnah
text:
Ray handles his dismissal with much grace.

The narrator is wrong, anyway. I'm an avid fan of all of Ray's nacho drama.

name: hellofditties
text: Which readers would say they're tired of seeing Ray in the strip all the time? Tell me.

name: theryuujin
text: "I laughed so hard you got a chubby"

name: theryuujin
text: lamed myself for misquoting.

name: theryuujin
text: or attempted to...

name: cpnglxynchos
text: is Watermelon Schnapps good?

name: mikeronomicon
text: Asherdan's posts can be summed up by the John Gabriel greater internet fuckwad theory. Internet   reasonable person   anonymity = fuckwad

name: wallabeechamp
text: I miss Philippe....

name: kennisiou
text:
Beep bop boop
bop bop bwoop

Those are the video game sounds I miss hearing the most. If I could get games with those sound effects now, I think that would be better. All Call of Duty Seven where when you shoot a gun it goes "Boop bip boop-boop." That would be so awesome.

name: draykid
text: That was just depressing.

name: johnnybaverage
text:
Phillipe turned into my brother.

Well, no, OK, my brother wouldn't call anyone "fag." Still uncanny.
